subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles beat the San Diego Padres, 8-2, and Milwaukee beat the Cincinnati Reds, 8-1, to move to three and a half games behind St. Louis in the wild-card race.
snippet: Los Angeles beat the San Diego Padres, 8-2, and Milwaukee beat the Cincinnati Reds, 8-1, to move to three and a half games behind St. Louis in the wild-card race.
